institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 13 (Project Implementation Period)
contents: Article 13 (Project Implementation Period) The project implementation period (hereinafter referred to as *project period) shall be a maximum of 3 years in accordance with Article 6 (2) of the Vocational Competency Development Regulations, but companies with poor performance will be supported through performance evaluation on a yearly basis. may be discontinued or subsidies may be reduced.
